data.title: Article
data.text:
LIFETIME AND GALYAN'S SPONSOR FAN NIGHT

March 19, 2002

CLEARFIELD, Utah - Lifetime Products Inc., a local manufacturer of residential basketball systems, is offering area residents the opportunity to win a free basketball system and to meet Utah Jazz player Andrei Kirilenko. The events are part of the Galyan's/Lifetime Fan Night. Fan Night will be held at Galyan's sporting goods store at the Gateway Center in Salt Lake City on March 22 from 5-7 p.m.

Lifetime Products will be sponsoring a free throw contest during Fan Night. Each person who makes a free throw automatically will be entered to win a Lifetime Basketball System. The Basketball System features a 48" steel-framed acrylic backboard and the easy one-hand Action GripÂ® height adjustment mechanism. In addition, every person who attempts a free throw will be registered to win other great prizes including a Kelty Blanca Pack. Prizes will be awarded every 15 minutes. The grand prize basketball system winner will be announced Friday, March 22 at 7 p.m. in Galyan's. Winners need not be present to win.

Other Fan Night activities include autograph signings with Utah Jazz player Andrei Kirilenko, representatives from the Jazz Dancers, and the Jazz Bear. The Jazz personalities will be signing free posters and giveaways throughout the event.

Established in 1986, Lifetime Products is a privately held company headquartered in Clearfield, Utah. Lifetime Products manufactures state-of-the-art basketball equipment, as well as high-impact polyethylene folding tables and picnic tables. Today, Lifetime is found across the globe.
